description.value: Patch-clamp recordings from cerebellar neurons will be made to assist with constructing advanced Purkinje cell models and stellate cell models. The experiments will be designed to achieve optimal alignment with HBP cerebellar modelling, thus allowing efficient model construction. About 50 neurons will be recorded and analyzed.
